casebody.data:
APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

2002-1953. State v. Fitch.

Cuyahoga App. No. 79937, 2002-Ohio-4891. Discretionary appeal allowed and cause held for the decisions in 2002-1879, State v. Johnson, Cuyahoga App. No. 80459, 2002-Ohio-4581, and 2002-1888, State v. Jordan, Cuyahoga App. No. 80675, 2002-Ohio-4587; briefing schedule stayed.

Pfeifer, J., dissents.
